main event: On May 4, 1950, in Birmingham, Alabama, civilians reported sighting white to bluish-white unconventional aircraft that exhibited revolutionary behavior of being stationary, then moving vertically.
interesting points: The reported unconventional aircraft was observed for a duration of 15 minutes, suggesting a prolonged sighting.
The mysterious object displayed behavior that was described as revolutionary, indicating advanced or unconventional characteristics.
The tail of the object was described as a long fiery streak, suggesting a unique and unusual appearance.
Witnesses reported the object's high rate of speed and the changing brightness of the tail, adding to the intrigue of the sighting.
The object disappeared suddenly, leaving witnesses unable to determine its direction of movement, adding to the mysterious nature of the event.
